review: I love this fire stick. it was so easy to set up. I connected to wifi then did the software update and I was signed into my amazon account and my Netflix within 6 minutes. the longest part was the demo/introduction. the fire stick interface is set up identical to the fire t.v. which I also own. easy to navigate and find what I'm looking for. I do like the voice remote th a comes with the fire t.v. better than the regular remote that comes with the fire stick but the remote app is pretty awesome on my android.  I recommend the fire stick to everyone that doesn't have a smart tv.
